original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā sattarasavaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ talasattikaṁ uggiranti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū kupitāḥ anattamanāḥ sattarasavaggiyānam bhikkhūnam talasattikam uggiranti

original: “Ime, āvuso, chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā amhākaṁ talasattikaṁ uggirantī”ti.
analyzed: ime āvuso chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū kupitāḥ anattamanāḥ amhākam talasattikam uggiranti iti

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā sattarasavaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ talasattikaṁ uggirissantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū kupitāḥ anattamanāḥ sattarasavaggiyānam bhikkhūnam talasattikam uggirissanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, kupitā anattamanā sattarasavaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ talasattikaṁ uggirathā”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tumhe bhikkhave kupitāḥ anattamanāḥ sattarasa vaggiyānam bhikkhūnam tala sattikam uggiratha ati

original: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, kupitā anattamanā sattarasavaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ talasattikaṁ uggirissatha.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tumhe mogha purisāḥ kupitāḥ an atta manāḥ satta rasa vaggiyānam bhikkhūnam tala sattikam uggirissatha
neta moghapurisāḥ appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa kupito anattamano talasattikaṁ uggireyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa kupitaḥ an atta manaḥ tala sattikam uggireyya pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti
an abhiraddhaḥ āhata cittaḥ khila jātaḥ

original: kāyaṁ vā kāyapaṭibaddhaṁ vā antamaso uppalapattampi uccāreti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: kāyam vā kāya paṭibaddham vā antamasaḥ uppala pattam pi uccāreti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Upasampanne upasampannasaññī kupito anattamano talasattikaṁ uggirati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: upasampanne upasampanna saññī kupitaḥ anatta manaḥ talasattikam uggirati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Upasampanne vematiko kupito anattamano talasattikaṁ uggirati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: upasampanne vematikaḥ kupitaḥ anattamanaḥ talasattikam uggirati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Upasampanne anupasampannasaññī kupito anattamano talasattikaṁ uggirati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: upasampanne anupasampanna saññī kupitaḥ anattamanaḥ talasattikam uggirati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Anupasampannassa kupito anattamano talasattikaṁ uggirati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: an upasampannassa kupitaḥ an atta manaḥ talasattikam uggirati āpatti dukkaṭassa
an upasampanne upasampanna saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa
an upasampanne an upasampanna saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa
kenaci viheṭhīyamānaḥ mokkha adhippāyaḥ tala sattikam uggirati
